channel.title: Git on Yamato group wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Yamato group wiki

item.title: Get Started
item.description: Get started # Git and GitHub are very usefull tool and web application. This page describe how to install Git and create GitHub account. Create GitHub account and get student developer pack # You can use Gitlab but I like GitHub because GitHub provides Student Development Pack that is the same as Enterprise plan for free.(!!!) Access toppage Click “Sign up” button. fill in the blanks. Username is published to internet.

item.title: How to Set Path
item.description: How to Set Path # This pages is for user of Github Desktop on Windows10. Find where is GIt # Open file explorer and find path looks like below C:\Users\username\AppData\Local\GitHubDesktop\app-2.9.0\resources\app\git\cmd username and app-2.9.0 is different by every user. Have you found git.exe ? next, we set environment variable. Edit Environment Variable. # Windows + S and input environment variable and Enter.(in japanese, システム変数の...) Open Environment Variables(環境変数) Click below Add the path.
